chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
aemi: applied_entries_monotonic_interface
smci: state_machine_correct_interface
si: sorted_interface
lacimi: lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
client: clientId
id: nat
out: output

Goal:
forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (i : raft_input) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), handleInput h i st = (os, st', m) -> ~ in_output_list client id out os

Premises:
Record lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface { lastApplied_commitIndex_match_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> lastApplied_commitIndex_match net; commitIndex_lastApplied_match_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> commitIndex_lastApplied_match net; lastApplied_lastApplied_match_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> lastApplied_lastApplied_match net } Arguments lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive raft_input (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := Timeout : raft_input | ClientRequest : clientId -> nat -> input -> raft_input Arguments raft_input {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments Timeout {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments ClientRequest {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
in_output_list = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (os : list raft_output) => In (ClientResponse client id o) os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> list raft_output -> Prop Arguments in_output_list {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
Record state_machine_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_state_machine_correct_interface { state_machine_correct_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> state_machine_correct net } Arguments state_machine_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_state_machine_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleInput = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (inp : raft_input) (state : raft_data) => match inp with | Timeout => handleTimeout me state | ClientRequest client id c => handleClientRequest me state client id c end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), name -> raft_input -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments handleInput {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
Record applied_entries_monotonic_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_applied_entries_monotonic_interface { applied_entries_monotonic' : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (os : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') os -> exists es : list entry, applied_entries (nwState net') = applied_entries (nwState net) ++ es; applied_entries_monotonic : forall (e : entry) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record log_matching_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_matching_interface { log_matching_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_matching net } Arguments log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive raft_output (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := NotLeader : clientId -> nat -> raft_output | ClientResponse : clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output Arguments raft_output {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments NotLeader {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope Arguments ClientResponse {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
doLeader_key_in_output_list : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', m) -> ~ in_output_list client id out os
doLeader_same_log : forall (st : raft_data) (n : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st n = (os, st', ms) -> log st' = log st
handleClientRequest_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
handleClientRequest_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
doGenericServer_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (out, st', ms) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
handleTimeout_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleTimeout_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
doLeader_appliedEntries : forall (sigma : name -> raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader (sigma h) h = (os, st', ms) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') = applied_entries sigma
tryToBecomeLeader_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), tryToBecomeLeader n st = (out, st', ms) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
tryToBecomeLeader_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), tryToBecomeLeader n st = (out, st', ms) -> log st' = log st
applyEntries_spec : forall (es : list entry) (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data), applyEntries h st es = (os, st') -> exists (d : data) (cc : list (clientId * (nat * output))), st' = RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st d) cc
raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleClientRequest_logs_sorted : forall (h : name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (net : network), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, st, l) -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted_host net -> sorted (log st)
raft_invariant_handle_input : forall (P : network -> Prop) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ in_output_list client id o os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_commitIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> log st' = log st
handleAppendEntries_same_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h...
in_output_list_empty = fun H : in_output_list client id out [] => H : ~ in_output_list client id out []
in_output_list_split : forall l l' : list raft_output, in_output_list client id out (l ++ l') -> in_output_list client id out l \/ in_output_list client id out l'
RIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h (nwState net h) = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_network -> list Net.name * ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list Net.name) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out0 : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out0, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec to (update2 Net.name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net)...
in_output_changed : forall tr o : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)), ~ in_output_trace client id out tr -> in_output_trace client id out (tr ++ o) -> in_output_trace client id out o
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
key_in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ key_in_output_list client id os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments key_in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _%list_scope
RaftInputHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (inp : raft_input) (state : raft_data) => let '(handlerOut, state0, pkts) := handleInput me inp state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (handlerOut ++ leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_input -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftInputHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
in_input_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists h : name, In (h, inl (ClientRequest client id i)) tr : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_input_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
in_output_list_dec : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (os : list raft_output), {in_output_list client id o os} + {~ in_output_list client id o os}
